description:
Katz Hawin, Letz Cofan, and Kikka Kitamoto are three of the younger refugees who escape from Side 7 aboard the White Base. Having lost their parents, they latch onto their caretaker Fraw Bow and the rest of the ship`s crew, and soon become the White Base`s beloved mascots. Often mischievous, and always noisy, they nonetheless prove to be just as vital to the ship`s survival as their older crewmates.
Source: Official Site
name: Letz Cofan
